description: A very large Duskmourn mechanics package: Rooms, Eerie, Impending, Manifest Dread, Survival, and Delirium, plus synergies and support pieces.

Creature: Eerie — put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
Survival — At the beginning of your second main phase, if this is tapped, create a 1/1 white [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature token.
Delirium — When this enters, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, gain 4 life.
When this enters, manifest dread. (Look at the top two cards of your library. Manifest one and put the other into your graveyard.)
Whenever one or more enchantments enter under your control, tap up to one target creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Instant: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Eerie — If an enchantment entered under your control this turn or you fully unlocked a Room, instead put two +1/+1 counters on it.
Exile target attacking creature. Delirium — You gain 2 life.
Untap up to two target creatures. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to them this turn. If you manifested dread this turn, draw a card.
Sorcery: Create two 1/1 white [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature tokens. Eerie — Then creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand. Delirium — Return target creature card instead.
Enchantment: Eerie — whenever an enchantment enters under your control, scry 1.
At the beginning of your upkeep, gain 1 life. Delirium — Instead gain 3 life.
EnchantmentCreature: Impending 3 {2}W (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 3 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) When the last counter is removed, create a 3/3 white [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature token.

Impending 2 {3}W (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 2 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) When this becomes a creature, draw two cards.

Impending 4 {1}W (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 4 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) As long as this isn't a creature, it has hexproof.
Artifact: Whenever you fully unlock a Room, put a charge counter on this. {T}, Remove three charge counters from this: Draw two cards.
Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Whenever equipped creature is turned face up, it gains first strike until end of turn. Equip {2}.
AuraCreature:
Enchant creature
When this enters, tap enchanted creature. Eerie — Draw a card.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Delirium — Enchanted creature has vigilance, trample, menace, prowess, or hexproof depending on color identity.
AuraLand:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color." Eerie — When this enters, scry 1.

Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller gains 1 life. Delirium — Add an additional {1}.

Creature: Eerie — draw a card, then discard a card.
Survival — At the beginning of your second main phase, if this is tapped, return up to one other target creature you control to its owner's hand.
When this enters, manifest dread. Whenever a face-down creature you control is turned face up, you may tap target creature an opponent controls.
Delirium — This has flying and ward {1} as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Instant: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the number of enchantments you control.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you fully unlocked a Room this turn, draw a card.
Turn target face-down creature you control face up. Draw a card.
Sorcery: Look at the top four cards of your library. Manifest dread, then put one of the rest into your hand and the others into your graveyard.
Create a 1/1 blue Illusion creature token with "When this becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it." Eerie — Create two of those tokens instead.
Enchantment: Eerie — target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Delirium — At the beginning of your end step, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, draw a card.
EnchantmentCreature: Impending 3 {2}U (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 3 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) When the last counter is removed, create a 3/3 blue [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature token.

Impending 2 {3}U (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 2 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) When this becomes a creature, draw two cards.

Impending 4 {1}U (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 4 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) As long as this isn't a creature, it has hexproof.
Artifact: Whenever you fully unlock a Room, put a charge counter on this. {T}, Remove three charge counters from this: Draw two cards.
Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Whenever equipped creature is turned face up, it gains first strike until end of turn. Equip {2}.

Enchant creature
When this enters, tap enchanted creature. Eerie — Draw a card.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Delirium — Enchanted creature has vigilance, trample, menace, prowess, or hexproof depending on color identity.
AuraLand:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color." Eerie — When this enters, scry 1.

Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller gains 1 life. Delirium — Add an additional {1}.

Creature: Eerie — each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Survival — At the beginning of your second main phase, if this is tapped, each opponent loses 2 life.
When this enters, manifest dread. Whenever a creature you control is turned face up, each opponent mills two cards.
Delirium — This gets +2/+0 and has menace as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Instant: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of enchantments you control.
Destroy target creature with mana value {MV} or less. Delirium — You gain 2 life.
Manifest dread, then each opponent loses 1 life for each face-down creature you control.
Sorcery: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If you fully unlocked a Room this turn, return that card to the battlefield tapped instead.
Search your library for a card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Delirium — You may put it onto the battlefield tapped instead.
Enchantment: Eerie — each opponent discards a card, then you may exile a card from a graveyard.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, manifest dread.
EnchantmentCreature: Impending 3 {2}B (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 3 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) When the last counter is removed, create a 3/3 black [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature token.

Impending 2 {3}B (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 2 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) When this becomes a creature, draw two cards.

Impending 4 {1}B (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 4 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) As long as this isn't a creature, it has hexproof.
Artifact: Whenever you fully unlock a Room, put a charge counter on this. {T}, Remove three charge counters from this: Draw two cards.
Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Whenever equipped creature is turned face up, it gains first strike until end of turn. Equip {2}.

Delirium — Enchanted creature has vigilance, trample, menace, prowess, or hexproof depending on color identity.
AuraLand:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color." Eerie — When this enters, scry 1.

Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller gains 1 life. Delirium — Add an additional {1}.

Creature: Eerie — this gets +1/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Survival — At the beginning of your second main phase, if this is tapped, this deals 1 damage to any target.
When this enters, manifest dread. Whenever a face-down creature you control is turned face up, this deals 2 damage to any target.
Delirium — This has first strike and "Whenever this attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn" as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Instant: This deals 3 damage to any target. If an enchantment entered under your control this turn, this deals 4 damage instead.
Manifest dread. Then creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Destroy target artifact. Eerie — Create a tapped Treasure token.
Sorcery: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens. Eerie — They gain haste until end of turn.
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play them. If you fully unlocked a Room this turn, add {R}.
Enchantment: Eerie — this deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you manifest dread, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
EnchantmentCreature: Impending 3 {2}R (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 3 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) When the last counter is removed, create a 3/3 red [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature token.

Impending 2 {3}R (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 2 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) When this becomes a creature, draw two cards.

Impending 4 {1}R (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 4 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) As long as this isn't a creature, it has hexproof.
Artifact: Whenever you fully unlock a Room, put a charge counter on this. {T}, Remove three charge counters from this: Draw two cards.
Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Whenever equipped creature is turned face up, it gains first strike until end of turn. Equip {2}.

AuraLand:

Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller gains 1 life. Delirium — Add an additional {1}.

Creature: Eerie — put a +1/+1 counter on this.
Survival — At the beginning of your second main phase, if this is tapped, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
When this enters, manifest dread. Whenever a face-down creature you control is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Delirium — This has trample and vigilance as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Instant: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If you fully unlocked a Room this turn, it also gains trample until end of turn.
Manifest dread, then untap up to two target creatures.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If an enchantment entered under your control this turn, create a 1/1 green [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature token.
Sorcery: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Eerie — You gain 2 life.
Enchantment: Eerie — creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever a creature you control is turned face up, draw a card.
EnchantmentCreature: Impending 3 {2}G (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 3 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) When the last counter is removed, create a 3/3 green [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature token.

Impending 2 {3}G (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 2 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) When this becomes a creature, draw two cards.

Impending 4 {1}G (You may cast this for its impending cost. It enters with 4 time counters on it and isn't a creature while it has any. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter.) As long as this isn't a creature, it has hexproof.
Artifact: Whenever you fully unlock a Room, put a charge counter on this. {T}, Remove three charge counters from this: Draw two cards.

Delirium — Enchanted creature has vigilance, trample, menace, prowess, or hexproof depending on color identity.
AuraLand:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color." Eerie — When this enters, scry 1.

Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller gains 1 life. Delirium — Add an additional {1}.

notes.rooms: Modeled as Enchantment — Room with unlockable doors and reminder text. Treated as static text in this generator.
notes.impending: For Enchantment Creatures; remove counters at your end step before it becomes a creature.
notes.eerie: Triggers on enchantment ETB and on fully unlocking a Room.
notes.manifest_dread: Look at top two, manifest one, mill the other.
notes.delirium: 4+ card types among cards in your graveyard enable stronger effects.
